# Screenshots

This folder contains screenshots for the main README.

## Needed Screenshots

Please capture and add the following images:

### 1. `dock-main.png` (Primary screenshot)
- Show the dock at the bottom of the screen with all icons visible
- Include running indicators (dots) on active applications
- Capture with a clean, attractive desktop background
- Recommended size: 1200x200 or similar (wide view)

### 2. `dock-context-menu.png` (Optional - in "More Screenshots")
- Right-click on an icon or the dock background to show the context menu
- Show configuration options
- Recommended size: 600x400

### 3. `dock-hover.png` (Optional - in "More Screenshots")
- Hover over an icon to show the tooltip
- Capture the tooltip clearly visible
- Recommended size: 600x400

## Screenshot Tips

- Use a clean, distraction-free background
- Ensure good lighting/contrast
- Capture at native resolution, then resize if needed
- PNG format with transparency if possible
- Show the dock with a nice variety of recognizable app icons

## How to Add Screenshots

1. Take screenshots using Windows Snipping Tool or similar
2. Save as PNG files with the exact names listed above
3. Place them in this folder (`.github/images/`)
4. The README will automatically display them

## Alternative: Use a placeholder

Until real screenshots are ready, you can add a placeholder:
```
https://via.placeholder.com/1200x200/1e1e2e/ffffff?text=rdock+Screenshot+Coming+Soon
```
